Key Match Events: Sikandar Raza and Tendai Chatara played key roles in Zimbabwe's victory
Washington Sundar kept India in the game till the final over
Shubman Gill was outfoxed by Sikandar Raza
India's debutants Abhishek Sharma, Riyan Parag, and Dhruv Jurel had a forgettable match with the bat
Pre-Game Insights: India chose to field a young side, handing three debut caps to Abhishek Sharma, Riyan Parag, and Dhruv Jurel
Post-Match Reflections: Shubman Gill expressed disappointment with the team's performance and his own dismissal at a crucial stage
Gill mentioned that the team was rusty and not up to standard
Washington Sundar's efforts were acknowledged but deemed insufficient to secure a win
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's first defeat in T20Is in 2024
Zimbabwe ended India's World Cup celebration with this win
